channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lorry damaged street sign, 15th September
item.description:
The street sign to Fairfield Walk (crossroads junction at Fairfield Walk/Naunton Lane/Mead Road) has been badly damaged by a reversing lorry accessing Mead Road. It is bent and broken and needs replacing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Naunton Lane, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign structurally damaged/leaning more than 20 degrees/loose in ground (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Human poo in bus stop, 15th September
item.description:
Human poo in bus stop (again) at the top of Hucclecote Road at the junction with Gloucester Business Park. Unpleasant & even more so if stood in by anyone & this is a busy stop for adults and children.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 15th September
item.description:
Barriers are on the floor and Temp lights areon read heading towards the race course and heading away from race course the lights are not working at all. there is no on onsite either,
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 15th September
item.description:
Customer reporting lights are "out" and people are driving through them. He was waiting for 10 mins before he drove through them, it is pretty chaotic.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles
